alert.note: Alert for Bakersfield; Buena Vista; Buttonwillow - Lost Hills - I5; Delano-Wasco-Shafter; Hanford - Corcoran - Lemoore; South End San Joaquin Valley; South End Sierra Foothills; Southeast San Joaquin Valley; West Side Mountains South of 198 (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 21 at 10:15AM PDT by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Kern, southeastern Kings and southwestern Tulare Counties through 1100 AM PDT... At 1015 AM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 13 miles south of Corcoran to near Cuyama. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bakersfield, Delano, Wasco, Shafter, Earlimart, McFarland, Taft, Terra Bella, Maricopa, Ducor, Rosedale, Valley Acres, Derby Acres, Ford City, Taft Heights, Dustin Acres, McKittrick, South Taft, Tupman and Richgrove. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
